install::TempContent::Objects::mod_perl-2.0.12::docs::api::ModPerl::RegistryPrefork(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation install::TempContent::Objects::mod_perl-2.0.12::docs::api::ModPerl::RegistryPrefork(3)

NAME

ModPerl::RegistryPrefork - Run unaltered CGI scripts under mod_perl

Synopsis

  # httpd.conf
  PerlModule ModPerl::RegistryPrefork
  Alias /perl-run/ /home/httpd/perl/
  <Location /perl-run>
      SetHandler perl-script
      PerlResponseHandler ModPerl::RegistryPrefork
      PerlOptions +ParseHeaders
      Options +ExecCGI
  </Location>

Description

See Also
